name: Omega Moon
description:
check this page if the games give the "Your browser does not allow to read local files."

This game is really in early development showcase, expect a lot of bugs that will definitely be updated in future, you can still tell me if you find something off in any way, thank you!

Omega Moon is about a mysterious witch, with a dark backstory, somehow connected to the events of Omega Fantasy.

 I apologize for every error that might stop you from continuing, the game is still in development and I’ll constantly update it and fix all the errors I find.
